name: Reinforced +5
tooltip: Unit protected by a shield that absobs up to <d ref="duckiesHeroPaladinShield_ResponseDamageLVL5.damage_shield_settings.shields_max" style="Bold"/> damage, regenerates <d ref="duckiesHeroPaladinShield_HealingLVL5.percentage" style="Bold"/>% life per second and makes it resilient to stuns.
